annotations.description: I've teamed up with Welch’s to shed light on a few of history’s forgotten moments. Let's journey into History's Grape Moments! #Ad **************************...
annotations.title: Welch’s Concord Sour | How To Drink

textContent:
.75 oz. -or- 22ml. Simple Syrup
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lemon Juice
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Bourbon

Shake vigorously 
Pour into Rocks Glass
Add 1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Red Grape Juice Float

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=21FYGS5YZUg
title: Concord Sour
